p: The antioxidant potential of milk thistle oils, nigella oil, Î±-tocopherol, silymarin, resveratrol, and ferrulic acid was evaluated with the KRL (Kit Radicaux Libres) test, as previously described [ 46, 50]. The data are presented in Trolox equivalents. Hemolysis was recorded using a 96-well microplate reader by measuring the decay of the optical density at 450 nm on a spectrophotometer. For each well, absorbance measurements were made 75 times, once every 150 s.
